Your wellness newsletter for the month of December

-beae8a8acb3a%7D_cignahlthcr_logo_color_rev_rgb.png> 
 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7B77531c5f-9a18-4478-83c2-354696562e63%7D_04_StressHoliday_Header_750.jpg> 	

Middle East & Africa wellness newsletter 


December 2024 

 <https://image2.comms.cigna.com/EloquaImages/clients/CignaGHBIntl/%7Bc126220d-91e1-40d2-b6cb-df0b6286d51c%7D_2023-brand-leaf.png> 	

Taking time off is vital for both mental and physical health. 

Research shows that disconnecting from work and allowing for genuine rest can lower stress and improve mental clarity. By unplugging, engaging in joyful activities, and planning a gradual return, you can harness the full power of time off and return to work more focused and productive. 

Read more <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Furl.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com%2Fs%2FI4p2CnNv4UGE1kLHNi9IJg1Up%3Fdomain%3Dapp2.comms.cigna.com&data=05%7C02%7Chagop.ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C36d98da9392b45be7d5408dd234b96e4%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638705529768288181%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=%2Bth8ru7zn6rXvlnWvz7zsyR3e7uohF53qlntQ6rCFwQ%3D&reserved=0>
